00033 #define TEMP_CLEAR_WARM_RESET   0x00
00034

00036 #define WDT_USB_WARM_RESET (0xa5a5)

00045                                Types section
00046  ******************************************************************************/
00048 #if defined(AT91SAM7X256)
00049   typedef enum
00050   {
00052     POWER_ON_RESET   = 0x00,
00054     WDT_RESET        = 0x02,
00056     WARM_RESET       = 0x03,
00058     EXTERNAL_RESET   = 0x04,
00060     BROWN_OUT_RESET  = 0x05
00061   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00062 #elif defined(ATMEGA1281) || defined(ATMEGA2561) || defined(ATMEGA1284) || defined(AT90USB1287) || defined(ATMEGA128RFA1) \
00063    || defined(ATMEGA256RFR2) || defined(ATMEGA2564RFR2)
00064   typedef enum
00065   {
00067     NULL_PTR_DEREF_RESET = 0x0,
00069     POWER_ON_RESET       = 0x1,
00071     EXTERNAL_RESET       = 0x2,
00073     BROWN_OUT_RESET      = 0x4,
00075     WDT_RESET            = 0x8,
00077     JTAG_RESET           = 0x10,
00079     WARM_RESET           = 0x11
00080   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00081 #elif defined(ATXMEGA128A1) || defined(ATXMEGA128B1) || defined(ATXMEGA256A3) || defined(ATXMEGA256D3)
00082   typedef enum
00083   {
00085     NULL_PTR_DEREF_RESET = 0x00,
00088     POWER_ON_RESET       = (1U << 0),
00091     EXTERNAL_RESET       = (1U << 1),
00093     BROWN_OUT_RESET      = (1U << 2),
00096     WATCHDOG_RESET       = (1U << 3),
00099     DEBUG_RESET          = (1U << 4),
00102     WARM_RESET           = (1U << 5)
00103   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00104 #elif defined(AT32UC3A0512)
00105   typedef enum
00106   {
00109     POWER_ON_RESET       = (1U << 0),
00112     BROWN_OUT_RESET      = (1U << 1),
00114     EXTERNAL_RESET       = (1U << 2),
00116     WDT_RESET            = (1U << 3),
00118     DEBUG_RESET          = (1U << 4),
00120     CPUERR_RESET         = (1U << 7),
00123     OCDRST_RESET         = (1U << 8),
00126     JTAGHARD_RESET       = (1U << 9),
00128     WARM_RESET           = (1U << 10),
00129   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00130 #elif defined(AT91SAM3S4C) || defined(AT91SAM4S16C)
00131   typedef enum
00132   {
00135     GENERAL_RESET        = 0x00,
00138     BACKUP_RESET         = 0x01,
00140     WDT_RESET            = 0x02,
00142     WARM_RESET           = 0x03,
00144     EXTERNAL_RESET       = 0x04
00145   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00146 #elif defined(ATSAMD20J18) || defined(ATSAMD21J18A) || defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00147   typedef enum
00148   {
00151     POWER_ON_RESET            = (1U << 0),
00153     BROWNOUT12_DETECTOR_RESET = (1U << 1),
00155     BROWNOUT33_DETECTOR_RESET = (1U << 2),
00157     EXTERNAL_RESET            = (1U << 4),
00159     WDT_RESET                 = (1U << 5),
00161     WARM_RESET                = (1U << 6),
00162   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00163 #elif defined(WIN)
00164   typedef enum
00165   {
00167     FAKE_RESET_REASON        = 0x00,
00168   } HAL_ResetReason_t;
00169 #else
